name: khanon-web
description: A view to my personal and professional projects
author: Lorenzo Portillo

scripts.build: npm run clean && node copy-assets.js && rimraf dist/index.html && webpack --config webpack.prod.js
scripts.build:deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy
scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version -f && npm run publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version -f && npm run publish
scripts.publish:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version -f && npm run publish
scripts.publish:git: git add . && git commit -m "[Published %npm_package_version%]" && git push
scripts.publish: node version.js && npm run build && npm run publish:git && npm run deploy
